column4: People, i've got a problem here. My ubuntu don't navigate the web. The configuration is correct. I navigate using windows and the same IP configurations, but with ubuntu I can't...
But firefox don't surf..
can you type in an ip into the browser and get a site
it might be dns
Not all IP
but do you get any?
I've tried with opendns webserver IP and it don't open
If you type  64.233.161.18 2    what do you get
I know, I got the google page
But I try to open 207.68.219.60
And it dosen't
and if you try google.com   you get?
no
so one problem at a time.. and I am a bit busy, someone like pike can better ehlp you.
If you are behind a router we need to look at port forwarding
With windows, I've the same IP configurations and it don't happen
just wanted to check it...  it should not be the prob
I don't have access to the router here...
Sorry :(
if it works in one it should not be the problem with the other
